1997 Company Name City State Observed and assessed student performance and kept thorough records of student progress Managed classrooms of 12 to 70 students during my tenure as coordinator responsible children individually and in small groups to help them with difficult subjects Taught after school and summer enrichment programs Established positive relationships with students parents fellow
